pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, April 24, 2016:

Kananaskis, Alberta

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at the Delta Lodge at Kananaskis for the Cabinet Retreat.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Alberta Premier, Rachel Notley.

Mt. Allen Room
Mt. Kidd Manor
Delta Lodge at Kananaskis
Kananaskis, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
